name: DragonflyMagicHaiku
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dragonfly magic haiku
des: This skill offers a collection of haiku for people who are looking for a quick dash of short-form poetry. Dragonfly Magic Haiku features traditional and modern haiku to inspire and set a mood. Simple voice commands activate a random haiku which adds to a sense of surprise. Dragonfly Magic Haiku content covers a variety of topics including nature, moments of stillness, friendship, and more. Easy to use, all you need to do is start the Dragonfly Magic Haiku skill with the wake word and ask for a haiku. Compatible with Alexa-enabled devices.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
